Title: Relates to establishing the downstate New York power authority, and providing for its powers and duties
Summary: Establishes the downstate New York power authority, provides for its powers and duties.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 1-C §§1022 - 1022-t, amd §51, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the downstate New York power authority, and providing for its powers and duties
